targets.query:
ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)  

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)  

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])
  |> max()

// Es kann sein, dass die Werte für yiedday nicht immer stimmen
// weil ein WR neu startet oder erst einer läuft.
// Darum wird der Tagesertrag aus den yieldtotal Werten berechnet


ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) // maximal Wert des Tages
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])           // time shift
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)                                // falls aktueller Tag noch keine Werte hat
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])    // Differenz zwischen zwei Tagen ist der Tagesertrag


pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) 
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])

ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: 1654053929)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: 1654053929)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value + ${produktion_alter_wr}}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) // maximal Wert des Tages
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])           // time shift
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)                                // falls aktueller Tag noch keine Werte hat
  |> fill(value: 0.0)                                       // falls mehrere Tage keine Werte haben
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])    // Differenz zwischen zwei Tagen ist der Tagesertrag

pn

ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) // maximal Wert des Tages
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])           // time shift
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)                                // falls aktueller Tag noch keine Werte hat
  |> fill(value: 0.0)                                       // falls mehrere Tage keine Werte haben
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])    // Differenz zwischen zwei Tagen ist der Tagesertrag

  ps

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/power" or r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")|> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/1/power" or r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/2/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/1/power" or r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/2/power" or r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/3/power" or r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/4/power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "limiter/status/system_limit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "limiter/status/system_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "limiter/status/controler_interval")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "limiter/status/controler_increment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Frauenfeld")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000000 })) // Millisekunden
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunset")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Frauenfeld")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000000 })) // Millisekunden
  |> last()

// Es kann sein, dass die Werte für yiedday nicht immer stimmen
// weil ein WR neu startet oder erst einer läuft.
// Darum wird der Tagesertrag aus den yieldtotal Werten berechnet


ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) // maximal Wert des Tages
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])           // time shift
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)                                // falls aktueller Tag noch keine Werte hat
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])    // Differenz zwischen zwei Tagen ist der Tagesertrag


pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true) 
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s, columns: ["_time"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : (r._value_ps + r._value_pn) * ${strompreis}}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])

ps = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: 1654053929)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/116181045303/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

pn = from(bucket: "jackdaw")
  |> range(start: 1654053929)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "jackdaw_telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/114182959402/0/yieldtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

join(tables: {ps: ps, pn: pn}, on: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value : r._value_ps + r._value_pn }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value + ${produktion_alter_wr}}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * ${strompreis}}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_ps", "_value_pn"])
